full_summary:
### Bid Opportunity for Computer Aided Dispatch (CAD) Solution
### Request for Information # 2 (RFI # 2)
---

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Information # 2 (RFI # 2) regarding a Computer Aided Dispatch (CAD) Solution.

### Solicitation Details
- **Reference Number**: WS4359038138-Doc4359113167
- **Solicitation Number**: WS4359038138
- **Publication Date**: 2023-12-19
- **Closing Date**: [Update]*2024-02-01T14:00:00*

### Overview 
This solicitation is part of the procurement process for a CAD Solution. The procurement process's primary goal is to identify suitable vendors to provide a CAD Solution to the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP).

### Procurement Details
- **Procedure**: Competitive - Open bidding
- **Trade Agreements**: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), and others

### Contact Information
- **Name**: Daniel Pilon, PSPC/SPAC
- **Email**: [daniel.pilon3@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:daniel.pilon3@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- **Note**: The closing date has been updated from 2024-02-15T14:00:00 to 2024-02-01T14:00:00 to provide vendors with an adequate amount of time to submit their submissions.
---

***Updated Closes Date*** 
To give vendors enough time to submit their quotations, the closing date has been changed to 2024-02-01T14:00:00. All submissions made after this time will be considered non-responsive.

### Notice URL
- **English URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18319784?extsite=MTgzMTk3ODRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
- **French URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18319784?extsite=MTgzMTk3ODRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
